aether.name: Aether
aether.description: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

albedo.name: Albedo
albedo.title: Kreideprinz
albedo.description: A genius known as the Kreideprinz, he is the Chief Alchemist and Captain of the Investigation Team of the Knights of Favonius.

aloy.name: Aloy
aloy.title: Savior From Another World
aloy.description: Formerly an outcast, now a hunter of unparalleled skill. Ready to do the right thing at any time.

amber.name: Amber
amber.title: Gliding Champion
amber.description: Always energetic and full of life, Amber's the best — albeit only — Outrider of the Knights of Favonius.

barbara.name: Barbara
barbara.title: Shining Idol
barbara.description: Every citizen of Mondstadt adores Barbara. She learned the word "idol" from a magazine.

beidou.name: Beidou
beidou.title: Uncrowned Lord of the Ocean
beidou.description: Captain of her crew, The Crux. She's quite an unbound and forthright woman.

bennett.name: Bennett
bennett.title: Trial by Fire
bennett.description: A good-natured adventurer from Mondstadt who's unfortunately extremely unlucky.

chongyun.name: Chongyun
chongyun.title: Frozen Ardor
chongyun.description: A young exorcist from a family of exorcists. He does everything he can to suppress his abundance of yang energy.

diluc.name: Diluc
diluc.title: The Dark Side of Dawn
diluc.description: The tycoon of a winery empire in Mondstadt, unmatched in every possible way.

diona.name: Diona
diona.title: Kätzlein Cocktail
diona.description: A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern.

eula.name: Eula
eula.title: Dance of the Shimmering Wave
eula.description: The Spindrift Knight, a scion of the old aristocracy, and the Captain of the Knights of Favonius Reconnaissance Company. The reason for which a descendant of the ancient nobles might join the Knights remains a great mystery in Mondstadt to this very day.

fischl.name: Fischl
fischl.title: Prinzessin der Verurteilung!
fischl.description: A mysterious girl who calls herself "Prinzessin der Verurteilung" and travels with a night raven named Oz.

cv.japanese: 内田真礼 & 増谷康紀

ganyu.name: Ganyu
ganyu.title: Plenilune Gaze
ganyu.description: The secretary at Yuehai Pavilion. The blood of the qilin, an illuminated beast, flows within her veins.

hutao.name: Hu Tao
hutao.title: Fragrance in Thaw
hutao.description: The 77th Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. She took over the business at a rather young age.

jean.name: Jean
jean.title: Dandelion Knight
jean.description: The righteous and rigorous Dandelion Knight, and Acting Grand Master of Mondstadt's Knights of Favonius.

kaedeharakazuha.name: Kaedehara Kazuha
kaedeharakazuha.title: Scarlet Leaves Pursue Wild Waves
kaedeharakazuha.description: A wandering samurai from Inazuma who is currently with Liyue's Crux Fleet. A gentle and carefree soul whose heart hides a great many burdens from the past.

kaeya.name: Kaeya
kaeya.title: Frostwind Swordsman
kaeya.description: An accomplished swordsman and a strategic thinker in the Knights of Favonius, rumored to hail from beyond Mondstadt.

kamisatoayaka.name: Kamisato Ayaka
kamisatoayaka.title: Frostflake Heron
kamisatoayaka.description: Daughter of the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan. Dignified and elegant, as well as wise and strong.

keqing.name: Keqing
keqing.title: Driving Thunder
keqing.description: The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Keqing has much to say about Rex Lapis's unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue — but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.

klee.name: Klee
klee.title: Fleeing Sunlight
klee.description: An explosives expert and a regular at the Knights of Favonius's confinement room. Also known as Fleeing Sunlight.

kujousara.name: Kujou Sara
kujousara.title: Crowfeather Kaburaya
kujousara.description: A general of the Tenryou Commission. Bold, decisive, and skilled in battle.

lisa.name: Lisa
lisa.title: Witch of Purple Rose
lisa.description: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius, deemed by Sumeru Academia to be their most distinguished graduate in the past two centuries.

lumine.name: Lumine
lumine.description: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

mona.name: Mona
mona.title: Astral Reflection
mona.description: A mysterious young astrologer who proclaims herself to be "Astrologist Mona Megistus," and who possesses abilities to match the title. Erudite, but prideful.

ningguang.name: Ningguang
ningguang.title: Eclipsing Star
ningguang.description: The Tianquan of the Liyue Qixing. Her wealth is unsurpassed in all of Teyvat.

noelle.name: Noelle
noelle.title: Chivalric Blossom
noelle.description: A maid who faithfully serves the Knights of Favonius. She dreams of joining their ranks someday.

qiqi.name: Qiqi
qiqi.title: Icy Resurrection
qiqi.description: An apprentice and herb gatherer at Bubu Pharmacy. An undead with a bone-white complexion, she seldom has much in the way of words or emotion.

raidenshogun.name: Raiden Shogun
raidenshogun.title: Plane of Euthymia
raidenshogun.description: Her Excellency, the Almighty Narukami Ogosho, who promised the people of Inazuma an unchanging Eternity.

razor.name: Razor
razor.title: Wolf Boy
razor.description: A boy who lives among the wolves in Wolvendom of Mondstadt, away from human civilization. As agile as lightning.

rosaria.name: Rosaria
rosaria.title: Thorny Benevolence
rosaria.description: A sister of the church, though you wouldn't know it if it weren't for her attire. Known for her sharp, cold words and manner, she often works alone.

sangonomiyakokomi.name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
sangonomiyakokomi.title: Pearl of Wisdom
sangonomiyakokomi.description: The Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island. All of the island's affairs are at this young lady's fingertips.

sayu.name: Sayu
sayu.title: Mujina Ninja
sayu.description: A pint-sized ninja attached to the Shuumatsuban, who always seems sleep-deprived.

sucrose.name: Sucrose
sucrose.title: Harmless Sweetie
sucrose.description: An alchemist filled with curiosity about all things. She researches bio-alchemy.

tartaglia.name: Tartaglia
tartaglia.title: Childe
tartaglia.description: No. 11 of The Harbingers, also known as "Childe." His name is highly feared on the battlefield.

thoma.name: Thoma
thoma.title: Protector From Afar
thoma.description: The Kamisato Clan's housekeeper. A well-known "fixer" in Inazuma.

venti.name: Venti
venti.title: Windborne Bard
venti.description: One of the many bards of Mondstadt, who freely wanders the city's streets and alleys.

xiangling.name: Xiangling
xiangling.title: Exquisite Delicacy
xiangling.description: A renowned chef from Liyue. She's extremely passionate about cooking and excels at making her signature hot and spicy dishes.

xiao.name: Xiao
xiao.title: Vigilant Yaksha
xiao.description: A yaksha adeptus who defends Liyue. Also heralded as the "Conqueror of Demons" and "Vigilant Yaksha."

xingqiu.name: Xingqiu
xingqiu.title: Juvenile Galant
xingqiu.description: A young man carrying a longsword who is frequently seen at book booths. He has a chivalrous heart and yearns for justice and fairness for all.

xinyan.name: Xinyan
xinyan.title: Blazing Riff
xinyan.description: Liyue's sole rock 'n' roll musician. She rebels against ossified prejudices using her music and passionate singing.

yanfei.name: Yanfei
yanfei.title: Wise Innocence
yanfei.description: A well-known legal adviser active in Liyue Harbor. A brilliant young lady in whose veins runs the blood of an illuminated beast.

yoimiya.name: Yoimiya
yoimiya.title: Frolicking Flames
yoimiya.description: Owner of Naganohara Fireworks. Known as "Queen of the Summer Festival," she excels in her craft of creating fireworks that symbolize people's hopes and dreams.

zhongli.name: Zhongli
zhongli.title: Vago Mundo
zhongli.description: A mysterious expert contracted by the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. Extremely knowledgeable in all things.
